column2: While I'm resetting this password, let's see what else I can find.
Ah... Here is a text conversation between two execs that might help me navigate this floor.
Man, I hate working here lately. The CEO keeps wanting to talk to me but I can never find his office. Doors seem to randomly take me to different places each time.
I know, it's getting worse. But it's actually not random. Some doors just lead to different locations depending on which direction you go through them.
I also noticed the doors that do that mess with the gravity in those rooms. So look for floating objects.
Oh, this is useful. They made an app that directs you to the CEO's office. I'll go ahead and download that.
Done. Now I should see arcane runes around the doors that will lead me to his office.
If not talked to IT worker
I bet this computer has valuable information on it yet. Too bad I don't have a way to access it right now.
